notifications.daily_tip: Reflect on the influences of the retrogrades.

educational_content.title: Understanding Retrogrades
educational_content.content: Retrogrades are periods when a planet appears to move backward in its orbit, as viewed from Earth. This is an optical illusion caused by differences in orbit speeds. During retrograde periods, the planet's energies are turned inward, making it a time for reflection and reassessment.

educational_content.title: How to Navigate Retrogrades
educational_content.content: During retrogrades, it's best to avoid starting new projects or making major decisions. Instead, focus on introspection, reviewing past actions, and making adjustments. Be patient and allow more time for everything, as delays and misunderstandings are common.
